Ketua Umum PSSI Iwan Bule Bicara Rangkap Jabatan dan Ratu Tisha
03 Nov 2019, 22:08 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Mochamad Iriwan alias Iwan Bule resmi menjabat Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023. Sekretaris Utama Lembaga Ketahanan Nasional (Lemhanas) ini terpilih dalam Kongres Luar Biasa yang digelar di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Iwan yang merupakan mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya mengalahkan dua calon tersisa yakni Rahim Soekasah dan Arif Putra Wicaksono. Delapan calon lainnya mundur sebelum pemilihan. Mereka yakni Aven S Hinelo, Benny Erwin, Bernhard Limbong, Fary Djemi Francis, La Nyalla Mattalitti, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Sarman, dan Yesayas Oktavianus.
Setelah menduduki kursi orang nomor satu di PSSI, Iwan Bule mempunyai tantangan untuk membagi waktu dengan pekerjaannya di Lemhanas. Persoalan rangkap jabatan pernah menjadi batu sandungan ketika Edy Rahmayadi sebagai Ketua PSSI periode 2016-2019. Saat itu Edy juga menjabat sebagai Panglima Komando Cadangan Strategis Angkatan Darat (Pangkostrad) dan Dewan Pembina Klub PSMS Medan. Edy akhirnya memilih mundur dari PSSI tak lama setelah terpilih menjadi Gubernur Sumatera Utara.
Mengenai rangkap jabatan dirinya, Iwan Bule mengatakan akan melihat perkembangan posisinya di Lemhanas seusai terpilih menjadi Ketua Umum PSSI. Menurut dia, tugas di Lemhanas sebenarnya tidak terlalu menguras waktu. "Saya di Sestama (Sekretaris Utama) Lemhanas tidak seperti Kapolda, jadi ada waktu untuk mencurahkan kepada PSSI. Saya akan bisa bagi itu," kata Iwan Bule di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Terkait rangkap jabatan Komite Eksekutif (Exco) di klub peserta liga, Mantan Kapolda Jawa Barat ini mengaku tidak bisa intervensi. Rangkap jabatan itu, kata dia, sudah terjadi pada pengurus PSSI periode sebelumnya. "Tinggal pengawasan kepada mereka saja. Nanti jadwal pertandingan juga mesti straight, jangan sampai menguntungkan Exco yang mempunyai klub," ujarnya.
Ia juga belum berpikir untuk meminta Exco PSSI yang terpilih untuk mundur dari klub. "Sementara ini kami belum sampai ke sana. Yang jelas kalau ditemukan hal menguntungkan atau merugikan klub lain, ya kami akan evaluasi," kata dia.
Dalam KLB PSSI memilih dua wakil ketua, yakni Cucu Sumantri dan Iwan Budianto. Ikut terpilih juga 12 anggota Exco. Mereka yakni Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Endri Erawan, Haruna Soemitro, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Hasani Abdul Gani, Yunus Nusi, Vivin Cahyani
Di antara anggota Exco PSSI yang tercatat sebagai pemilik klub, yakni Yoyok Sukawi yang menjadi CEO PSIS Semarang. Haruna Soemitro merupakan manajer Madura United. Lalu Hasnuryadi Sulaiman tercatat sebagai pemilik klub PS Barito Putera.
Salah satu yang bakal ikut menentukan keberhasilan Iwan Bule memimpin PSSI yakni posisi Sekretaris Jenderal PSSI. Saat ini posisi itu masih diduduki oleh Ratu Tisha.
Komite Eksekutif (Exco) PSSI akan mengevaluasi kinerja Ratu Tisha Destria selama menjabat pada tahun 2017-2019. Menurut Iwan Bule, hasil evaluasi akan diumumkan pada Desember 2019. Saat itu akan diputuskan apakah Ratu Tisha tetap menjabat Sekjen untuk periode 2019-2023 atau tidak.
“Apakah Ibu Ratu Tisha akan diganti atau tidak, kami akan mengevaluasinya. Dalam sebulan ke depan sudah ada keputusan,” kata Iwan.
Menanggapi hal itu, Ratu Tisha, menyatakan selama belum ada keputusan pergantian Sekjen, ia masih melakukan tugasnya sebagai Sekjen PSSI. Dia pun siap jika kembali ditunjuk oleh Exco menjadi pemimpin di kesekretariatan PSSI. “Saya siap mengemban amanah,” tutur dia.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
PSSI Chairwoman Iwan Bule Speak Dual Position and Ratu Tisha
03 Nov 2019, 22:08 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Mochamad Iriwan alias Iwan Bule officially served as the General Chairperson of PSSI 2019-2023. The Main Secretary of the National Resilience Institute (Lemhanas) was elected at the Extraordinary Congress held at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
Iwan who is a former Metro Jaya Police Chief defeated the two remaining candidates namely Rahim Soekasah and Arif Putra Wicaksono. Eight other candidates stepped down before the election. They are Aven S Hinelo, Benny Erwin, Bernhard Limbong, Fary Djemi Francis, La Nyalla Mattalitti, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Sarman, and Yesayas Oktavianus.
After occupying the number one seat at PSSI, Iwan Bule had the challenge of sharing his time with his work at Lemhanas. The issue of concurrent positions was a stumbling block when Edy Rahmayadi was Chair of PSSI for the period of 2016-2019. At that time Edy also served as Commander of the Army Strategic Reserves Command (Kostrad Commander) and PSMS Medan Board of Trustees. Edy finally chose to resign from PSSI shortly after being elected Governor of North Sumatra.
Regarding his double position, Iwan Bule said he would see the development of his position in Lemhanas after being elected as the General Chair of PSSI. According to him, the assignment at Lemhanas is actually not too time-consuming. "I am in Sestama (Main Secretary) of National Defense Institute not like the Regional Police Chief, so there is time to devote to PSSI. I will be able to share it," said Iwan Bule at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
Related to the concurrent position of the Executive Committee (Exco) at the club participating league, the former West Java Regional Police Chief admitted he could not intervene. The concurrent position, he said, had happened to the previous period PSSI management. "Just watch over them. Later the match schedule must also be straight, not to benefit Exco, which has a club," he said.
He also has not thought to ask PSSI's Exco to withdraw from the club. "In the meantime we have not yet gotten there. What is clear is that if something is found beneficial or detrimental to other clubs, yes we will evaluate it," he said.
In the KLB PSSI chose two deputy chairs, namely Cucu Sumantri and Iwan Budianto. 12 Exco members were also elected. They are Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Endri Erawan, Haruna Soemitro, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Hasani Abdul Gani, Yunus Nusi, Vivin Cahyani
Among Exco PSSI members registered as club owners, namely Yoyok Sukawi who became CEO of PSIS Semarang. Haruna Soemitro is Madura United's manager. Then Hasnuryadi Sulaiman was recorded as the owner of PS Barito Putera club.
One that will determine the success of Iwan Bule in leading PSSI is the position of Secretary General of PSSI. At present the position is still occupied by Queen Tisha.
PSSI Executive Committee (Exco) will evaluate the performance of Ratu Tisha Destria during her tenure in 2017-2019. According to Iwan Bule, the evaluation results will be announced in December 2019. At that time, it will be decided whether Ratu Tisha will remain as Secretary General for the period 2019-2023 or not.
"Whether Queen Tisha will be replaced or not, we will evaluate it. In the next month there has been a decision, "said Iwan.
In response, Ratu Tisha said that as long as there was no decision to replace the Secretary General, he was still carrying out his duties as Secretary General of PSSI. He was ready if he was reappointed by Exco to be the leader in the PSSI secretariat. "I am ready to carry out the mandate," he said.

IRSYAN HASYIM
